# Toolbox

An essential plugin for Hytale. It provides a set of useful commands and features to expand your capabilities.

## Command

| Command                               | Description                                                    |
|---------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
| `/announce "<message>"`               | Broadcast a message to all players                             |
| `/directmessage <player> "<message>"` | Send a private message to another player                       |
| `/back`                               | Teleports you to your location prior to a death, teleport, ... |
